title: Should I Give My Mom Another Chance?
description:
Desiree's mom is a recovering addict who threatens to kill herself if Desiree doesn't visit her. - Dr. Laura: "Addicts don't suddenly become better people when they stop using."

Has your life been effected by an addict? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:
